FuncDef: This command configures last resort IPv6 DNS addresses that can be used for name resolution by IPoEv6 hosts (IA_NA, IA_PD and SLAAC) and PPPoEv6 hosts (IA_NA, IA_PD and SLAAC).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 address of the primary DNS server.
Specifies the IPv6 address of the secondary DNS server (optional).
